content: *featuring classic diner treats these crocheted pot holders will be the talk of the breakfast table yarnspirations * --- **note ** intended for decorative use only --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m * contrast a jute 00082 *1 ball or 110 yds/100 m* * contrast b warm brown 01130 *1 ball or 20 yds/18 m* * contrast c white 00001 *1 ball or 40 yds/37 m* * contrast d yellow 00010 *1 ball or 8 yds/7 m* * contrast e red 00095 *1 ball or 35 yds/32 m* ---
